mapper.select:
SELECT subject_id, b.name subject_name, '' archives_name, '概览' archives_class FROM zs_overview a LEFT JOIN zs_subject b ON a.subject_id = b.id WHERE a.entity_id = #{id} and a.enable = '0'
UNION
select a.subject_id, c.name subject_name, b.name archives_name, '信息栏' archives_class FROM zs_infobar_entity a LEFT JOIN zs_infobar b on a.infobar_id = b.id LEFT JOIN zs_subject c on a.subject_id = b.id WHERE a.entity_id = #{id} and a.enable = '0'
UNION
SELECT b.subject_id, c.name subject_name, b.name archives_name, '档案' archives_class FROM zs_archives_entity a LEFT JOIN zs_archives b on a.archives_id = b.id LEFT JOIN zs_subject c on b.subject_id = b.id where a.entity_id = #{id} and a.enable = '0'
